definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
to carry (on one's person)/to support (old)/Taiwan pr. [xi1 dai4]
to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
to take the lead/to be the first/to set an example

sentences.english: Yield front propagates away from the wellbore with the process of sand production.
sentences.chinese: 屈服帶隨出砂量的增加沿井徑向外擴張。

sentences.english: I have nothing but some personal belongings.
sentences.chinese: 我只帶了一些個人用品。

sentences.english: But in the third week of May, currents drew some of the oil southeast.
sentences.chinese: 但到了5月的第三週，洋流開始把浮油帶向東南方向。

sentences.english: Oh Fiona found out she had some money in her pocket.
sentences.chinese: 哦，霏歐納兜裏帶了着些錢。

sentences.english: I only brought my passport and the Foreign Employment License.
sentences.chinese: 我只帶了護照和外國人就業證。

sentences.english: I had an alb on and a long robe with long sleeves.
sentences.chinese: 我穿着白袍，一件帶長袖的長袍。

sentences.english: The thief walked out of the gallery with the picture underneath his painter's smock.
sentences.chinese: 他把畫藏在了漆工的工作服下然後把它帶出了畫廊。

sentences.english: Judge Orie had the curtains drawn while Mladic was taken out of court.
sentences.chinese: 當姆拉迪奇被帶出法庭時，法官奧列將簾子拉下。

sentences.english: Once he took us to be photographed with him in some big English photographic studio.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，他帶我們到一個很大的英國照相館裏去照相。

sentences.english: The Jiapigou gold deposit lies in the lower part of the late Archaean greenstone belt.
sentences.chinese: 夾皮溝金礦產於晚太古宙綠巖帶的下部層位。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a jacket. I'd like one with a bag.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找一件夾克，我想要件帶兜的。

sentences.english: Give them some money to take their younger siblings out for ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 給他們些零花錢，讓他帶着他的弟妹們去買些冷飲。

sentences.english: Then, with the moon sister Xiaotu to its home.
sentences.chinese: 接着，月亮姐姐帶着小兔來到了它的家。

sentences.english: The effect ol' Liu Shen Wan (LSW) on the ultrastructure and function of the zonafasciculata of adrenal cortex was observed in this study.
sentences.chinese: 觀察了六神丸對腎上腺皮質束狀帶形態與功能的作用。

sentences.english: Don't think of those sad things , take a usual heart and go.
sentences.chinese: 別想那些傷心的事，就帶一顆平常的心走。

sentences.english: The main rotary shaft can be simultaneously fixed with a plurality of circular discs with self rotation shafts.
sentences.chinese: 主轉軸上可同時固定多個帶自轉軸的圓盤。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to press charges/to file a complaint
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
